change.item: This record was migrated from InMagic DB Textworks to ArchivesSpace.

did.abstract: Phyllis Robbins was an author and the biographer of Maude Adams. The collection consists of a typescript of her book, Robert A. Taft: Boy and Man (1962).

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Phyllis Robbins is the biographer of Maude Adams and author of Maude Adams: An Intimate Portrait (1956); The Young Maude Adams (1959); and Robert A. Taft: Boy and Man (1962).

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Phyllis Robbins typescript, Sophia Smith Collection, SSC-MS-00476, Smith College, Northampton, Mass.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of a typescript of Robert A. Taft: Boy and Man (1962).

accessrestrict.id: aspace_This collection is open for use without restriction beyond the standard terms and conditions of Smith College Special Collections.
accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for use without restriction beyond the standard terms and conditions of Smith College Special Collections.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Materials in this collection may be governed by copyright. For reproductions of materials that are governed by fair use as defined under U. S. Copyright Law, no permission to cite or publish is required. Researchers are responsible for determining who may hold materials' copyrights and obtaining approval from them. Researchers do not need anything further from Smith College Special Collections to move forward with their use.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The source of acquisition is unknown.
